Package org.pentaho.pat.client.ui.widgets

Class Summary
ConnectMondrianPanel Connection Panel for Mondrian Connections.
ConnectXmlaPanel The Class ConnectXmlaPanel.
DataWidget A widget used to show the examples in the content panel.
DimensionDropWidget Creates the Drag and Drop enabled dimension widget.
DimensionFlexTable DimensionFlexTable creates a flextable that accepts drag and drop widgets for OLAP axis.
MemberSelectionLabel The Class MemberSelectionLabel.
OlapTable Creates the OLAP flextable used for displaying the data
SelectionModePopup The Class SelectionModePopup.
WelcomePanel Basic Welcome Panel that currently opens the PAT Homepage.
